methods.Synopsis: Returns the item ID for a specified project counter. The 'counter' is the number you see in urls like https://rollbar.com/accountname/projectname/items/1234/

parameters.Name: counter
parameters.Description: The project-specific counter identifier of the item. Get this from URLs like https://rollbar.com/accountname/projectname/items/1234/

methods.Synopsis: Returns data for the specified item ID.

parameters.Name: item_id
parameters.Description: The system-wide ID of the item. Get this ID from the /item_by_counter/:counter endpoint.

methods.Synopsis: Returns a page of all items for the project.

parameters.Name: status
parameters.Description: If not empty, only return items with the specified status. Note: does not affect the result when 'ids' is used.

parameters.Name: ids
parameters.Description: If not empty, list of item IDs to return instead of using all items from the project.

parameters.Name: page
parameters.Description: Page number, optional, starting from 1. 20 items are returned per page.

methods.Synopsis: Returns data for the specified instance ID.

parameters.Name: instance_id
parameters.Description: ID of the instance to retrieve. Same as found in URLS like rollbar.com/item/:item_id/instance/:instance_id

methods.Synopsis: Returns a page of all the instances for the project.

parameters.Name: ids
parameters.Description: If not empty, list of item IDs to return instead of using all items from the project.

parameters.Name: page
parameters.Description: Page number, optional, starting from 1. 20 instances are returned per page.

methods.Synopsis: Returns a page of all instances for a particular item.

parameters.Name: item_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the item. Same as the ID found in the URL, e.g. http://rollbar.com/item/:item_id

parameters.Name: page
parameters.Description: Page number, optional, starting from 1. 20 items are returned per page.

methods.Synopsis: Returns data for the specified deploy ID.

parameters.Name: deploy_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the deploy. Same as the ID found in URLs like rollbar.com/deploy/:deploy_id

methods.Synopsis: Returns a page of all deploys for the project.

parameters.Name: ids
parameters.Description: If not empty, list of deploy IDs to return instead of using all deploys from the project.

parameters.Name: page
parameters.Description: Page number, optional, starting from 1. 20 deploys are returned per page.

parameters.Name: environment
parameters.Description: Environment name. Any string up to 255 characters is OK. For best results, use conventional names like 'production', 'staging', 'development' when applicable.

parameters.Name: revision
parameters.Description: Revision identifier. For git, use the full sha.

parameters.Name: timestamp
parameters.Description: Unix timestamp when the deploy completed. Defaults to the current timestamp.

parameters.Name: duration
parameters.Description: Deploy duration, in seconds. Defaults to 1. If you don't measure this, just omit it.

parameters.Name: comment
parameters.Description: Free-form text describing the deploy

parameters.Name: local_username
parameters.Description: Username or other identifier of the user who deployed. For example, the output of `whoami`

parameters.Name: rollbar_username
parameters.Description: Rollbar username of the user who deployed.

methods.Synopsis: Returns information about the project that the used access_token belongs to.
